headline: Digital Marketing Specialist | Storyteller | Marketing Automation

experiences.title: Makeup Artist
experiences.description: Engage with customers to develop relationships and trust as an artist to provide solutions to issues through product recommendations, application and education within a short period of time. Consistently stay up to date with current global trends, techniques and improving myself to understand, educate and teach customers.

experiences.title: Marketing Work Experience Student
experiences.description:
* Collaborated in teams of 2-6 to brainstorm and develop marketing strategies and campaigns.
* Managed, created, and designed presentations for the Mayor, City Council, and Executive
* Leadership Team as the designated designer.
* Conducted research, analyzed and summarized information to develop print and digital collateral
* through Adobe Creative Suite to deliver clear, concise and complete content.

experiences.title: Management Trainee Intern
experiences.description: Marketed the Automated Rental Management Suite (ARMS) Automotive program to 6 body shops and successfully signed 2 new accounts. Analyzed the situation, problems and financial statements to determine areas of improvement in sales to obtain a +90% completely satisfied customer service score. Relayed information between service vendors and insurance adjusters to ensure status and availability of rental and customer vehicles are up to date.

experiences.title: Independent Beauty Consultant
experiences.description: Determined clients problems with skincare and cosmetics and deliver solutions based on budget, time and skill level. Marketed to potential customers and a loyal customer base of 15 through hosting events to educate about benefits, comparisons, purposes of products, application, and technique. Personally managed finances, order placement, and distribution.
